name: Digital Marketing and Agency Templates Addons for Elementor
author: codenpy

sections.description:
Digital Marketing and Agency Templates for Elementor

plugin will allow you to build awesome stunning Digital and Agency home pages and inner pages with only single click. Super and fast way to show modern templates inside elementor page builder with 3 home pages. Digital marketing and agency templates gives you 3 complete home pages with 17+ addons that will suits for any kind of digital and agency pages. You can easily import digital marekting and agency templates with one click. Go to Digital Marketing Agency Templates for Elementor and you will see import button, just click on it, it will automatically import digital and agency templates into your pages.

There are more than 17+ widgets with 3 ready to use templates, just you need to edit it with your own content.

Live Demo

Widgets List

  • Heading
  • Hero Section
  • Hero Section 2
  • Hero Section 3
  • Promo
  • Promo 2
  • Promo 3
  • About Us
  • Service
  • Call to Action
  • Call to Action 2
  • Pricing
  • Testimonial
  • Clients Logo
  • Team Member
  • ProgressBar

Features

  • 3 Stunning Home Pages
  • One Click Demo Import
  • 100% Responsive all elements
  • Super easy Installation.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.

Tags: elemenotr, addons, agency template, digital marketing template, one click import, responsive, page builder
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or upload the .zip file with the plugin under Plugins > Add New > Upload.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Navigate to Elementor -> Digital Marketing Agency Templates for Elementor to import templates
